main.name: Blake Stillwell
main.description: I'm a design-minded full stack engineer focused on building beautiful interface & experiences.
main.bio: I'm a passionate developer and enthusiactic programmer who's always excited to create new projects. I have experience developing and designing web application, from simple landing pages to progressive web applications. I strive to create web applications that not only function efficiently, but also provides intuitive, perfect user experiences. I love learning new and better ways to create seamless user experiences with clean, efficient, and scalable code. I consider work an ongoing education, and I'm always looking for opportunities to work with those who are willing to share their knowledge as much as I want to learn. At the end of the day, my primary goal is to create something beautiful with people that bring out the best in me.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

education.description: Graduated with focus on JavaScript, MERN Stack, HTML, CSS
Graduated with Bachelors degree in General Biology. Cum Laude.

work.title: Web Designer
work.description: Designed and built website for EZ Radio Strap

testimonials.text: Blake is extremely committed and self-motivated. A versatile team partner. Anyone would be lucky to have Blake as a colleague.
